subject: Baseball
Assaults
lead_paragraph: Josh Tomlin outpitched Boston’s Josh Beckett, Cleveland came up with just enough timely hits and the Indians kept the visiting Red Sox winless this season with a 3-1 victory Tuesday night.
snippet: Josh Tomlin outpitched Boston’s Josh Beckett, Cleveland came up with just enough timely hits and the Indians kept the visiting Red Sox winless this season with a 3-1 victory Tuesday night.
